org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.mgmt.alarm
Class EdgeTriggeredAlarmControl

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.mgmt.alarm.AlarmControl
      org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.mgmt.alarm.EdgeTriggeredAlarmControl

public class EdgeTriggeredAlarmControl
extends AlarmControl

This class extends AlarmControl to control alarms generated when a monitored, integer-valued, model element first crosses a threshold value (the alarmThreshold). This type of alarm is called "edge triggered". The monitored value must cross a potentially different threshold (the rearmThreshold) before it can be triggered again.

Constructor Detail

EdgeTriggeredAlarmControl

public EdgeTriggeredAlarmControl(java.lang.String name,
                                 boolean enabled,
                                 AlarmLevel level,
                                 int suppressInterval,
                                 int alarmThreshold,
                                 int rearmThreshold,
                                 EdgeTriggeredAlarmDirection direction)
Constructor.

Parameters:
name - A unique identifier
enabled - Defines whether the Alarm is enabled
level - The Alarm level
suppressInterval - The minimum number of seconds that shall elapse before the next Alarm of the same type is generated
alarmThreshold - Threshold that must be crossed to trigger an alarm ready to fire
rearmThreshold - Threshold that must be crossed before a fired alarm can be triggered again
direction - Defines whether the alarm will be triggered on a rising or a falling edge
